activities: Tencap Sports provides software as a service to sports club organizations.  These organizations send Tencap contact information of their organizational members to upload into the Tencap Tennis System.  Once uploaded, Tencap provides the members with tools to login to their profile, update their contact and tennis information and control the privacy of their profiles.
personaldata: Organization and Customer Data that is electronically processed according to instructions provided by the Organization or the Customer.
recoursemech: The European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs)
